alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 5:51PM EDT until June 03 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Darlington County in northeastern South Carolina... Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 551 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cheraw State Park, or near Cheraw, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Hartsville, Darlington, Mccoll, Clio, North Hartsville, Dovesville, Mont Clare, Darlington Raceway, Auburn, Wallace, Mechanicsville, Chavistown, Floyd, Florence Darlington Technical College Main Campus, Society Hill, Blenheim and Tatum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
